name: small-business-chatbot-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Small Business Chatbot with API and Web Frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../apps/web && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
